parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Preloads area to be used with [[findEmptyPosition]] command and returns [[true]] when area is ready. The size of the area preloaded is from <tt>center - radius - maxDistance</tt> to <tt>center + radius + maxDistance</tt><br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Preloading large areas may take a long time, we are talking minutes. However once preloaded, it stays preloaded even after mission restart</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> center '''findEmptyPositionReady''' [radius, maxDistance] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> center: [[Array]] - Search area center position in format [x,y] or [x,y,z] in which case z is ignored. Accepts [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [radius, maxDistance]: [[Array]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - distance from the center </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> maxDistance: [[Number]] - distance from the end of radius </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when ready </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Preload aread within 500m: <code>_ready = _center [[findEmptyPositionReady]] [0, 500];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[findEmptyPosition]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
